title: Window Location
content:
The Window.location or location-only read-only property returns a Location object with information about the current location of the document.
location example:
```
{
  "href": "http://localhost:8001/#content",
  "origin": "http://localhost:8001",
  "protocol": "http:",
  "host": "localhost:8001",
  "hostname": "localhost",
  "port": "8001",
  "pathname": "/",
  "search": "",
  "hash": "#content"
}
```

title: Pad
Date
content:
### Métodos
```
getDate()           -> Returns the day of the month (from 1-31)
getDay()            -> Returns the day of the week (from 0-6)
getFullYear()       -> Returns the year (XXXX)
getMonth()          -> Returns the month (from 0-11)
getHours()          -> Returns the hour (from 0-23)
getMinutes()        -> Returns the minutes (from 0-59)
getSeconds()        -> Returns the seconds (from 0-59)
getMilliseconds()   -> Returns the milliseconds (from 0-999)
getTime()           -> Returns the number of milliseconds since midnight Jan 1 1970, and a specified date
getTimezoneOffset() -> 	Returns the time difference between UTC time and local time, in minutes
```

title: Array
content:
`push` - Adicionar um elemento no final:
```
var numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4]
numbers.push(5)
console.log(numbers) // [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]

```
`shift` - Remover o primeiro elemento:
```
var numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
numbers.shift()
console.log(numbers) // [2, 3, 4, 5]
```
`pop` - Remover o último elemento:
```
var numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
numbers.pop()
console.log(numbers) // [1, 2, 3, 4]
```
`indexOf` - Obtem o índice do elemento de acordo com sua posição:
```
var numeros = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
var index = numeros.indexOf(2)
console.log(index) // 1
```
`splice` - O método splice() remove o elemento desejado.
```
// array.splice(index, count, item1, ...., itemX)
var numbers = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
numbers.splice(2, 1)
console.log(numbers) // [1, 2, 4, 5]
```

title: Slice
content:
### Remove characters from beginning:
```
const name = 'Evandro'
console.log(name.slice(1))
// return: 'vandro'
```
### Remove characters from end:
```
const name = 'Evandro'
console.log(name.slice(name.lenght, -1))
// return: 'Evandr'
```

title: Fetch
content:
### Get
```
fetch ("http://super-api.atwebpages.com")
  .then(res => res.json())
  .then(content => console.log(content))
```
### Post
```
fetch ("http://super-api.atwebpages.com/login", {
    headers: {
      'Content-Type': 'application/json'
    },
    method: 'POST',
    body: JSON.stringify(({
      login: 'login',
      password: 'password'
    }))
  })
    .then(res => res.json())
    .then(content => console.log(content))
```
### Read local File
```
fetch ("config.yml")
  .then(res => res.text())
  .then(content => console.log(content))
```

title: Undefined
content:
### Para verificar se é undefined.
```
var b = 5;
console.log(typeof a === "undefined"); // true
console.log(typeof b === "undefined"); // false
```
### Para verificar se está definida.
```
var b = 5;
console.log("a" in window); // false
console.log("b" in window); // true
```

title: Local Storage
content:
Syntax:
```
window.localStorage
```
or just:
```
localStorage
```
Save Data to Local Storage:
```
localStorage.setItem(key, value)
```
Read Data from Local Storage:
```
let lastname = localStorage.getItem(key)
```
Remove Data from Local Storage:
```
localStorage.removeItem(key)
```
Remove All (Clear Local Storage):
```
localStorage.clear()
```
